snippet: Sons of the Pro Football Hall of Famers Barry Sanders and Howie Long and the baseball great Ken Griffey Jr. have committed to play football at colleges next season.
abstract: Sons of the Pro Football Hall of Famers Barry Sanders and Howie Long and the baseball great Ken Griffey Jr have committed to play football at colleges next season.
lead_paragraph: Sons of the Pro Football Hall of Famers Barry Sanders and Howie Long and the baseball great Ken Griffey Jr. have committed to play football at colleges next season.

headline.seo: Sons of Barry Sanders, Howie Long and Ken Griffey Sign
headline.main: Stars’ Sons Seek Success of Their Own in Football
